entry.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Frontend: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

entry.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
entry.content: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

entry.title: kunalcoder45/Cravid_web: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and share them with others.
entry.content: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and share them with others.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: KhaledObaidCubes/tree-structure-utils: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript utility for creating, managing, and traversing tree data structures. Provides typed interfaces for nodes, helper functions for building hierarchies, and tools for manipulating tree relationships like parent-child links and descendant tracking.
